categories.kitchenLongDesc: Cookware, serveware, and tools designed to celebrate everyday meals and elevate your culinary experience.
categories.bathroomLongDesc: Plush textures, aromatics, and rituals for your self-care sanctuary. Transform your bathroom into a spa.
categories.livingLongDesc: Warm lighting, purposeful decor, and lounge-ready textiles for every gathering and quiet moment.
categories.storageLongDesc: Smart organization that calms the chaos and keeps essentials within reach. Declutter with style.
categories.laundryLongDesc: Care rituals that leave linens fresh, folded, and ready for rotation. Make laundry day enjoyable.
categories.outdoorLongDesc: Weather-ready accents for patio hangs, impromptu picnics, and golden hour dining under the stars.

cart.freeShipping: Free shipping on orders over 2,625 TMT

home.heroTitle: Elevate Everyday Moments with Thoughtfully Designed Essentials
home.heroDesc: Curated collections for the kitchen, bath, and living spaces that make home feel special. Sustainably crafted, beautifully simple.
home.newsletterLongDesc: Join 40,000+ subscribers and get weekly notes on seasonal refreshes, care tips, and founder Q&As.
home.newsletterDisclaimer: By subscribing you agree to receive marketing emails. Unsubscribe anytime.
home.testimonial1Quote: The attention to detail on every delivery blew me away. The storage baskets transformed our entryway overnight.
home.testimonial2Quote: I finally feel like my kitchen is pulled together. The herb planters and canisters ship fast and make cooking joyful.
home.testimonial3Quote: The design concierge helped me layer lighting in our lounge. Hearth & Home feels like the modern general store.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

footer.tagline: Thoughtful household essentials for mindful living. Sustainably crafted, beautifully simple goods for your home.

admin.dragDropImages: Drag and drop images or click to browse

artisan-stoneware-canister-set.name: Artisan Stoneware Canister Set
artisan-stoneware-canister-set.description: Wheel-thrown stoneware canisters with snug acacia lids to keep dry goods fresh and display ready.

walnut-mise-en-place-board.name: Walnut Mise en Place Board
walnut-mise-en-place-board.description: Double-sided prep board with routed wells that keep chopped herbs and aromatics organized before cooking.

slate-stone-dinnerware-set.name: Slate Stone Dinnerware Set
slate-stone-dinnerware-set.description: A twelve-piece dinnerware set cast in matte stone that transitions from everyday meals to entertaining.
highlights: Includes dinner, salad, and side plates

copper-gooseneck-pour-over-kettle.name: Copper Gooseneck Pour-Over Kettle
copper-gooseneck-pour-over-kettle.description: Precision gooseneck kettle with temperature control for pour-over mornings and tea service.

stonewashed-linen-apron-set.name: Stonewashed Linen Apron Set
stonewashed-linen-apron-set.description: Cross-back aprons cut from stonewashed linen with generous pockets for prep tools and tasting spoons.
highlights: Adjustable cross-back straps relieve neck pressure

cloudweight-spa-towel-bundle.name: Cloudweight Spa Towel Bundle
cloudweight-spa-towel-bundle.description: Ultra absorbent spa towels with a plush terry side and textured reverse for home spa mornings.
highlights: Includes two bath, two hand, two face towels

teak-serenity-bath-caddy.name: Teak Serenity Bath Caddy
teak-serenity-bath-caddy.description: Solid teak bath caddy with adjustable arms, space for a book, tablet, and candle for spa nights at home.
highlights: Extends 27" to 41" to fit most tubs
Includes safe slots for glass and devices

cedar-slatted-bath-mat.name: Cedar Slatted Bath Mat
cedar-slatted-bath-mat.description: Aromatic cedar bath mat that wicks water and adds warmth to tile floors.

aromatherapy-shower-steamers.name: Aromatherapy Shower Steamers
aromatherapy-shower-steamers.description: Eucalyptus and citrus shower steamers that transform quick showers into spa moments.

bamboo-bath-storage-ladder.name: Bamboo Bath Storage Ladder
bamboo-bath-storage-ladder.description: Lean this ladder beside the tub to hang towels, store baskets, and keep bath trays within easy reach.

belgian-linen-throw.name: Belgian Linen Throw
belgian-linen-throw.description: Lightweight linen throw woven in Flanders with a soft stonewashed finish for effortless layering.

lowline-oak-coffee-table.name: Lowline Oak Coffee Table
lowline-oak-coffee-table.description: Oversized oak coffee table with a chamfered edge and concealed storage built in small batches.
highlights: Soft close storage drawer for remotes

arc-ambient-floor-lamp.name: Arc Ambient Floor Lamp
arc-ambient-floor-lamp.description: Oversized linen shade and arched steel base create soft, room-defining light.

hearth-ceramic-diffuser.name: Hearth Ceramic Diffuser
hearth-ceramic-diffuser.description: Ultrasonic ceramic diffuser with a soft glow base for evening rituals.

hearth-boucle-pillow-set.name: Hearth Bouclé Pillow Set
hearth-boucle-pillow-set.description: Pair of pillows in boucle and linen that adds depth to sofas and reading chairs.

pine-cane-storage-baskets.name: Pine + Cane Storage Baskets
pine-cane-storage-baskets.description: Modular storage baskets with cane webbing fronts and integrated labels that stack effortlessly.
highlights: Set of 2 medium and 1 large basket

willow-entryway-console.name: Willow Entryway Console
willow-entryway-console.description: Slim console with concealed drawers and a floating shelf to corral entryway essentials.

clear-stackable-shoe-drawers.name: Clear Stackable Shoe Drawers
clear-stackable-shoe-drawers.description: Ventilated drawers that stack vertically to keep footwear easy to see and protected.

pantry-closet-labeling-kit.name: Pantry & Closet Labeling Kit
pantry-closet-labeling-kit.description: Water-resistant labels and chalk markers that keep bins, baskets, and jars organized.
highlights: Sheets of blanks for custom naming

atelier-wardrobe-rack.name: Atelier Wardrobe Rack
atelier-wardrobe-rack.description: Rolling wardrobe rack with a solid oak shelf for shoes and baskets—perfect for entryways or guest rooms.

cedar-grove-laundry-trio.name: Cedar Grove Laundry Trio
cedar-grove-laundry-trio.description: Plant based detergent, linen mist, and wool dryer balls with a crisp cedar scent for fresh laundry days.
highlights: Detergent works in HE and standard machines
Includes three reusable wool dryer balls

canvas-crest-laundry-hamper.name: Canvas Crest Laundry Hamper
canvas-crest-laundry-hamper.description: Structured double hamper with removable cotton liners and walnut handles for easy sorting.

foldaway-laundry-table.name: Foldaway Laundry Table
foldaway-laundry-table.description: Wall-mounted folding table with hidden shelves that creates a laundry workstation in seconds.
highlights: Folds flat to 4 inches from wall

coastal-linen-refresh-spray.name: Coastal Linen Refresh Spray
coastal-linen-refresh-spray.description: Plant-based linen spray with notes of sea salt, bergamot, and amber for between-wash refreshes.

pressguard-steam-iron.name: PressGuard Steam Iron
pressguard-steam-iron.description: Hybrid iron and steamer with a stainless soleplate that glides over linens and delicates.

terrace-entertaining-set.name: Terrace Entertaining Set
terrace-entertaining-set.description: Weather-ready entertaining kit with a woven drink cooler, shatterproof glassware, and LED lantern.
highlights: Includes eight piece Tritan glassware set
Cooler keeps ice for up to 12 hours
Lantern offers three warm white settings

all-season-picnic-blanket.name: All-Season Picnic Blanket
all-season-picnic-blanket.description: Water-resistant picnic blanket with a quilted top and carrying strap for impromptu gatherings.

ridge-terracotta-planter-pair.name: Ridge Terracotta Planter Pair
ridge-terracotta-planter-pair.description: Set of two ridged terracotta planters with drainage trays for patios and balconies.
highlights: Ideal for herbs or small citrus

solar-glow-lantern-trio.name: Solar Glow Lantern Trio
solar-glow-lantern-trio.description: Solar-powered lanterns with warm-white LEDs and woven exterior for ambient patios.

cinder-bowl-gas-fire-pit.name: Cinder Bowl Gas Fire Pit
cinder-bowl-gas-fire-pit.description: Low-profile gas fire pit with lava rock fill that brings warmth to patios without smoke.
cinder-bowl-gas-fire-pit.materials: Glass fiber reinforced concrete, steel burner
highlights: Hidden propane compartment with quick ignition
Includes weather cover and lava rock

cast-iron-dutch-oven.name: Cast Iron Dutch Oven
cast-iron-dutch-oven.description: Enameled cast iron Dutch oven perfect for slow-cooked stews, fresh bread, and one-pot roasts.
highlights: Works on all stovetops including induction

marble-pastry-board.name: Marble Pastry Board
marble-pastry-board.description: Naturally cool marble surface ideal for rolling dough, tempering chocolate, and presenting cheeses.
highlights: Stays cool for delicate pastry work

nested-mixing-bowl-set.name: Nested Mixing Bowl Set
nested-mixing-bowl-set.description: Seven-piece stoneware mixing bowl set in graduated sizes with pour spouts and non-slip bases.
highlights: Each bowl in a different earth tone

rainfall-showerhead-system.name: Rainfall Showerhead System
rainfall-showerhead-system.description: Overhead rain shower with handheld wand and easy-install bracket that transforms any bathroom.

organic-cotton-bath-robe.name: Organic Cotton Bath Robe
organic-cotton-bath-robe.description: Plush GOTS-certified organic cotton robe with waffle weave texture for quick drying.

vanity-organization-tray.name: Vanity Organization Tray
vanity-organization-tray.description: Three-compartment marble and brass tray that corrals daily essentials on any bathroom counter.

woven-jute-area-rug.name: Woven Jute Area Rug
woven-jute-area-rug.description: Hand-braided jute rug that adds natural warmth and texture beneath coffee tables and reading nooks.

floating-oak-wall-shelf-set.name: Floating Oak Wall Shelf Set
floating-oak-wall-shelf-set.description: Set of three floating shelves in smoked oak with concealed brackets for clean gallery-wall displays.
highlights: Each shelf holds up to 15 kg

terracotta-table-lamp.name: Terracotta Table Lamp
terracotta-table-lamp.description: Sculptural terracotta lamp with linen drum shade that brings earthy warmth to bedside tables.

under-bed-rolling-drawer.name: Under-Bed Rolling Drawer
under-bed-rolling-drawer.description: Canvas and oak drawer on smooth casters that transforms wasted under-bed space into organized storage.

pegboard-wall-organizer.name: Pegboard Wall Organizer
pegboard-wall-organizer.description: Modular oak pegboard with shelves, hooks, and bins for entryways, offices, or craft rooms.
highlights: Mounting hardware for drywall and studs

tiered-corner-shelf-unit.name: Tiered Corner Shelf Unit
tiered-corner-shelf-unit.description: Five-tier corner shelf that maximizes forgotten corner space in any room.
highlights: Each shelf holds up to 10 kg

retractable-clothesline-reel.name: Retractable Clothesline Reel
retractable-clothesline-reel.description: Indoor-outdoor retractable clothesline with 12 meters of UV-resistant cord for air drying.
highlights: Holds up to 20 kg of laundry

wrinkle-release-steamer.name: Wrinkle Release Steamer
wrinkle-release-steamer.description: Compact garment steamer with continuous steam that freshens clothes in seconds without an ironing board.
highlights: 200 ml tank for 15 minutes of steam

mesh-wash-bag-set.name: Mesh Wash Bag Set
mesh-wash-bag-set.description: Set of six mesh bags in three sizes to protect delicates, activewear, and lingerie in the wash.

hammock-with-steel-stand.name: Hammock with Steel Stand
hammock-with-steel-stand.description: Double hammock on a portable steel frame — sets up in minutes for patio lounging or garden reading.

solar-pathway-light-set.name: Solar Pathway Light Set
solar-pathway-light-set.description: Eight solar-powered stake lights with warm amber LEDs that line walkways and garden paths.
highlights: Auto on at dusk, off at dawn

ceramic-herb-planter-kit.name: Ceramic Herb Planter Kit
ceramic-herb-planter-kit.description: Window-sill planter set with three ceramic pots, bamboo tray, and seed packets for basil, mint, and cilantro.
highlights: Includes drainage holes and bamboo tray
Three seed packets with growing guide
